law.catch_line: Violation Of Cease And Desist Orders; Penalty; Suspension Or Revocation Of License
law.text: Any person who violates a cease and desist order of the commissioner under section seven after it has become final, and while such order is in effect, shall forfeit and pay to the commonwealth a sum not to exceed ten thousand dollars for each violation, which sum may be recovered in a civil action. Upon order of the commissioner such person shall be subject to suspension or revocation of such personâ€™s license or such other relief as is reasonable and appropriate.
